name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!
Adds 138 cards, 4 relics, 2 potions and new buff/debuff powers exclusively to the Duelist character.

REQUIREMENTS
Basemod, StSLib, Replay the Spire, Conspire, The Servant, Slimebound

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.138.1
- Added Monster, Spell, Trap card types to all Duelist cards
- Removed Spike's Relics as a dependency
- Fixed new potions bug
- Fixed Raigeki having no upgrade

v1.138.0
- Added 2 new potions: Sealed Booster, Sealed Pack
- Added 3 new relics: Millennium Rod, Millennium Coin, Stone of Exxod
- Updated character image to be Yugi Moto
- Updated default character button image
- Updated character select screen portrait image
- Fixed random card generation pool logic
- Updated version to true card count (includes random-only cards)
- Fixed Card Destruction bug
- Various balancing adjustments (nerfs)
- Fixed Reducer orb UI bug

v1.132.0
- Added 2 new cards: Flute of Summoning Dragon, Lord of D.
- Added 5 new Dragon cards that can only be created via random card effect and are not in the core set
- Added second version of Dragon Orb, Dragon Orb+



Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
Email: nyoxidestsmods@gmail.com
Discord: Nyoxide#3464
